Instant Pot Rice

side
instant pot

Ingredients

  • 1 cup white rice
  • 1 cup water
  • 1/2 tsp kosher salt

Procedure

  1. Add white rice to a bowl and repeatedly fill the bowl with water, stir, and drain until water runs out clear
  2. Add washed rice and water to instant pot
  3. Pressure cook on high for 3 minutes
  4. Natural release pressure for 10 minutes
  5. Vent remaining pressure
